item.title: Paper: Zookeeper - Wait Free Coordination for Internet Scale Systems
item.dc:creator: Senthil Kumaran
item.description:
ZooKeeper - Wait-free coordination for Internet-scale systems is readable explanation of Zookeeper distributed coordination system. It gives the motivation behind the design and of overview of the API of the Zookeeper service.

The Zookeeper Overview article here also gives enough high level introduction that could be useful before reading the paper.

item.title: Paper: Rational Emotive Behaviour Therapy
item.dc:creator: Senthil Kumaran
item.description:
Brief Introduction to Rational Emotive Behaviour Therapy. by W Froggatt gives an overview of the Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy, a Cognitive Behavior Therapy school of though in psychology.

The topic itself is accessible and is easy to read. The paper has suggestion on number of books that cover this topic for further reading and study.
